divs: Sighting DetailsChicago had about 8-10 inches of rain Sept13th and 14th and since then I have noticed what looks like a star flashing green and red lights. I have asked many people since then to tell me what they see and they confirm the flashing red and green lights. This is a nightly event even today Sept 23rd it lasts all night until dawn. Take a look for yourself there is more than one and before the flood they were not there because I check the sky's regularly.
Summary: Star's flashing red and green lights since the flood of 2008
